text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende B\u001b\u001bacher iraisonablem Prei\u001b\u001b\u001c zu haben seyen : <BIBL><TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE> de An. <YEAR>1738</YEAR>. & <YEAR>1739</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE> maiores <VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>, samtl. in <FORMAT>4t\u001b\u001b\u001c</FORMAT>. <BIBL><TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE> ex Editione <AUTHOR>Joannis Clerici</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE> mit <AUTHOR>Sinceri</AUTHOR> Anmerckungen</BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Bocceri</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Schefferi</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE></BIBL>; und <BIBL><AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>, samtl. in <FORMAT>8v\u001b\u001b\u001c</FORMAT>.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":2,"explanation":"Replaced invalid XML characters with their corresponding Unicode escape sequences. Added missing closing tags for nested BIBL elements."}
